text: atahpara tomadera ki hala ye, tomara munaphekadera byapare duâ€™dala haye gele? Yakhana allaha taderake tadera krtakarmera jan'ya purbabasthaya phiriye diyechena [1]. Allaha yake pathabhrasta karena tomara ki take satpathe paricalita karate ca'o? Ara allaha ka'uke'o pathabhrasta karale apani tara jan'ya kakhano kono patha pabena na
